name: Creamed Corn
keywords: corn, heavy cream, milk, fall, side dish, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 2 7 1/2-ounce packages John Cope's dried sweet corn (approximately 4 cups)
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Place corn in large bowl with milk and cream. Cover and refrigerate for at least 4 hours, preferably overnight.

Add sugar, salt and butter. Transfer to saucepan and bring to boil, stirring to avoid sticking. Reduce heat to low and simmer, stirring occasionally, for 30 minutes. Season to taste with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
